title: Add a HandOffBehavior property to VisualStateGroup
body: We have lots of problems with VisualStates  overlapping. When two VisualStates modify a controls property, when one of them changes, effects of other VisualState animations on this control's properties are also removed! I tried Inheriting VisualStateGroup and overriding(or even hiding) StartNewThenStopOld that is responsible for this and use it within a custom VisualStateManager but every single property and method are internal!
